Artifact - Class in com.github.codeteapot.tools.artifact

Coordinates used to identify an artifact.

ArtifactRepository - Class in com.github.codeteapot.tools.artifact

ArtifactRepositoryException - Exception in com.github.codeteapot.tools.artifact
Exception occurred when trying to resolve an artifact through a repository.
